content: It's clear that you love Madelyn and are committed to her, and it's understandable that you're feeling frustrated and upset about the situation. One thing you could consider is seeking the help of a couples therapist or counselor who can provide a neutral and supportive environment for both of you to work through your issues and improve your communication skills. It's also important to take care of yourself and practice self-care during this time, as it can be emotionally draining to navigate difficult situations within a relationship.
